amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission by $13 million and reduce Federal Prison System funding by $14 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 as printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the EEOC salaries and expenses by $13 million, offsetting this amount with a $14 million reduction from the Federal Prison System salaries and expenses account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 265 (Roll no. 343).
